hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides #ReDeads# guarding a chest.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Huge Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #1# major item.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: I'm Commander Shepard, and this is my favorite Gossip Stone in Hyrule!

GC (Maze).text: They say that #a Red Rupee# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Goron Tunic# and #a Recovery Heart#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path of time.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path to #Morpha#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bomb Bag#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #final treasure of Ice Cavern# is #Bombs (20 pieces)#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Deku Shield#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Huge Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that plundering #inside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Underwater Left Chest

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Deku Shield#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #Din's Fire#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bomb Bag#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #a Small Key# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a chest in the #central pillar of Water Temple# contains #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Bomb Bag#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that ##Zora's River## has #0# major items.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Bombs (10 pieces)# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to #3 Deku Scrubs#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #a Deku Stick# can be found at #Zora's River#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Right-Center).text: I came here to chew bubblegum and play rando. And I'm all out of bubblegum.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the way of the hero.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path to #the Key#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Iron Boots# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Bomb Bag#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that racing #Dampé's ghost# rewards...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Hylian Shield#.
